name: MotorStorm Arctic Edge
description:
MotorStorm®'s breakneck racing festival moves to the unpredictable terrains and harsh temperatures of Alaska, where players throw caution to the wind and the ultimate goal isn't only to win, but to survive. Players race against vicious opponents and deal with sudden avalanches, broken ice bridges and unforgiving arctic altitudes. Breathtaking racing action on the PSP® system. Lunatics Unite! Notice: Multiplayer and all online features for this product will be terminated and will no longer be available as of October 1, 2012.

MotorStorm is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. © 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
